DOC.brief_summary: The VENEK trial is a randomized, prospective trial to compare economic parameters, quality of life and wound healing after endoscopic vein harvesting versus open vein harvesting.
DOC.brief_title: VENEK: Healing in Different Vein Harvesting Methods During Aortocoronary Coronary Artery Bypass Graft Surgery (CABG)
DOC.detailed_description: The VENEK trial is a randomized, prospective trial to compare economic parameters, quality of life and wound healing after endoscopic vein harvesting versus open vein harvesting.
DOC.criteria: Age over 60 years Admission at Herzzentrum Dresden Herzchirurgie for bypassoperation (OP) with planned veinectomy Eligibility for different modes of planned intervention according to study protocol Signed patient informed consent Varicose crural veins Emergency patients Combined operational procedures Preoperative complete immobilization
